Text: Daren get your American flagIMAGE IMAGE Dear Daren From out of something as horrific as the events of September th has come something truly amazing a growing sense of patriotism in America not felt for decades Weve felt it here at iWon in fact weve had numerous iWon members write to us and ask if iWon sold American Flags Theyve been hard to come by recently but now through the cooperation of The National Flag Display Company were proud to offer American Flag Kits to our members Each kit includes one x polyester flag piece pole styrene eagle and mounting bracket Click here to order your American Flag Kit and show your pride in our nation Thank you The iWon Team IMAGE Forgot your member name It is JDAREN Forgot your iWon password Click here You received this email because when you registered at iWon you agreed to receive email from us To unsubscribe from one or more email categories please click here Please note changes may take up to one week to process If youre not signed in you will need to do so before you can update your profile
